revision.text:
{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Allows attaching content to other content (e.g. projects, tasks, events and persons) in a hierarchical manner. |long description= Denotes a content item as subsection of another content item. |PAGENAME=Property:Subsection of |own_work=True |copyright_holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Is inverse of::Property:HasSubsection| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Content;| ]] [[Has type::Type:Page| ]]
[[Category:Transitive properties]]

{{Template |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Builds the inner table |PAGENAME=Template:RMListInnerTable |own_work=True |copyright_holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] |- | align="center" |{{{1}}}{{RMCategoryLinkIcon|{{{1}}}}} |{{#rmew:{{{1}}}|{{RMNoNamespace|{{{2}}} }}|700|500}} |[[{{{3}}}]] |{{#formatdate:{{{4}}}|ISO 8601}}{{{4}}} | align="center" |[{{fullurl:{{{1}}}}} {{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_info_icon_16x16.png][{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=formedit}} {{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_edit_with_forms_icon_16x16.gif] | align="center" |[{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=delete}} {{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_delete_icon_16x16.png]

<noinclude>{{Template |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=detects the right icon for the file |long description= |PAGENAME=Template:RMCategoryLinkIcon |own_work=True |copyright_holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] </noinclude><includeonly>{{#switch: {{#sub: {{lc: {{{1}}} }} | 0 |{{#pos:{{lc: {{{1}}} }}|:}} }} | file={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_image_icon_16x16.png | image={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_image_icon_16x16.png | pdf={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_pdf_icon_16x16.png | document={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_document_icon_16x16.png | audio={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_music_icon_16x16.png | video={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_video_icon_16x16.png | vcard={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_vcard_icon_16x16.gif | icalendar={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_icalendar_icon_16x16.gif | default {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_image_icon_16x16.png }}</includeonly><noinclude> </noinclude>

{{Form |PAGENAME=Form:RMUpload |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=This form is used to edit the information of rm uploads. |Form needs context=true |show in template picker=false |transcludable=false |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] __NORICHEDITOR__ {{{info|page name=RMUploadPage}}} {{{for template|RMUpload|label=Meta information|collapsible}}} {| width="100%" align="center" |- | width="30%" | | width="70%" | |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Uploaded by*: | {{{field|Uploader|mandatory|input type=haloACtext|constraints=ask: [[Category:Person]]|default=current user|size=40|maxlength=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The name of the uploader.) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Copyright by: | {{{field|CopyrightBy|size=40|maxlength=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The name of the person/company who holds the rights of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Creation date: | {{{field|CreationDate|input type=date|default=now}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (The date when this file has been created or recently changed) |- | style="display: none; " | {{{field|UploadDate|input type=date|mandatory|default=now}}} |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Short description: | {{{field|Description|input type=textarea|rows=3|cols=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Here you can enter a short description of this file) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Keywords: | {{{field|Keywords|multiple|size=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Here you can tag the file with different keywords) |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; font-weight: bold; " | Related articles: | {{{field|RelatedArticles|input type=haloACtext|constraints=namespace:0|size=40}}} |- |   | style="padding-bottom: 5px; font-size: 80%; font-style: italic; " | (Articles which are attached to this file) |- | {{{field|Filename|hidden}}} |- | style="color: red; " colspan="2" | Fields marked with a "*" are mandatory |} {{{end template}}}

{{Form |PAGENAME=Form:RMPdf |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=This form is used to edit the information of uploaded images. |Form needs context=true |show in template picker=false |transcludable=false |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] __NORICHEDITOR__ {{{for template|RMImage|label=Meta Information|collapsible}}} {| width="100%" align="center" |- | width="30%" | | width="70%" | |- | align="right" style="font-size: 100%; {{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Attribute for specifying the creation date of a media file. |PAGENAME=Property:HasCreationDate |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Has type::Date| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:HasFilename |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Used to specify a file name for a media file. The file name will be used as page title for the uploaded file. |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[has type::Type:String| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Denotes the date at which a media file was uploaded. The property value is automatically determined by the system upon uploading. |long description= |PAGENAME=Property:HasUploadDate |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Has type::Type:Date| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Relates a media file with the person who uploaded the file (e.g. User:WikiSysop). |long description= |PAGENAME=Property:HasUploader |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Media;Category:Person| ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:HasCopyrightBy |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Relates a media file with its copyright owner (e.g. a wiki-user). |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Media;Category:Person| ]]

{{Property |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Used for giving a textual description of a media file (see Category:Media). |long description=description |PAGENAME=Property:HasDescription |own_work=True }} {{RichMedia bundle}} [[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Subproperty of::Property:Description| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]] [[Content hash::16e5ee907ad24f9297121b7cf1448558| ]]

{{Category |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |Has default form=Form:RMUpload |rationale=This category subsumes media content coming from media files (e.g. document, audio, image and video files). |long description= |PAGENAME=Category:Media |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Category:Content|Content]]

{{Category |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |Has default form=Form:RMImage |rationale=Denotes all images. |PAGENAME=Category:Image }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Category:Media|Image]] [[Content hash::87a6fe6472941ab2c5b3ef9a5f50ccee| ]]

{{Category |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |Has default form=Form:RMPdf |rationale=Contains all PDF documents. |PAGENAME=Category:Pdf |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Category:Media|Media]] [[Content hash::c5f09a1ae5909802f0f0d33077bfa13c| ]]

{{Category |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |Has default form=Form:RMDocument |rationale=. |PAGENAME=Category:Document |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Category:Media|Document]]

{{Category |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |Has default form=Form:RMAudio |rationale=Contains all audio documents. |PAGENAME=Category:Audio |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Category:Media|Media]] [[Content hash::44c82b79efa27e3c4fffd3626cafc77a| ]]

{{Category |PAGENAME=Category:Video |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |Has default form=Form:RMVideo |rationale=Category which is used for tagging video files. |own_work=True }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] [[Category:Media|Video]]

{{Template |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=This template displays information of media (i.e. document, image, etc) in a box. |parameters=
{{RMMedia
|Media subcategory
|CopyrightBy
|CreationDate
|RelatedArticles
|Filename
|Description
|Keywords
|Format
|Uploader
|UploadDate
|SubSectionOf
}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:DataRMICal |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Used for formatting and annotating uploaded iCalendar files (which come into the wiki e.g. via file upload or email import with file attachment). |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMICalData
|icTitle=Kickoff meeting
|start=2009-10-13
|end=2009-10-15
|organizer=j.malcolm@email.org
|organizerName=John Malcolm
|attendee=j.malcolm@email.org, l.meyer@email.org 
|attendeeName=John Malcolm, Luca Meyer
|location=New York, Headquarters
|categories=Meeting
|description=Kickoff meeting for initial project status and start.
}}
|own_work=True |copyright_holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); margin: 0pt 0pt 0.5em 1em; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; position: relative; border-collapse: collapse; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; float: right; clear: right; width: 30%;" |- ! style="background: rgb(174, 229, 219) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; color: black;" colspan="2" | Image:Calendar.gif poly 0 0 0 0 [[Display]] desc none iCalendar Data |- {{#if:{{{icTitle|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Title: |Value={{{icTitle|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{start|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Start date: |Value={{{start|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{end|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=End date: |Value={{{end|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{organizer|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Organizer: |Value={{{organizer|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{organizerName|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Organizer name: |Value={{{organizerName|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{attendee|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Attendee(s): |Value={{{attendee|}}}}}|}}{{#vardefine:eventParticipants|{{#extractEmailID:{{#replace:{{{organizer|}}}, {{{attendee|}}}|,|;}}|Mbox}}}} |- {{#if:{{{attendeeName|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Attendee(s) name(s): |Value={{{attendeeName|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{location|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Location: |Value={{{location|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{categories|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Categories: |Value={{{categories|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{description|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Description: |Value={{{description|}}}}}|}} |- |}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:DataRMVCard |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=Richmedia |rationale=Used for formatting and annotating uploaded vCard files (which come into the wiki e.g. via file upload or email import with file attachment). |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMVCardData
|name=Danny Wilkension
|title=Senore
|organization=some company
|nickName=
|phone=054654-55464
|address=White chapel 13
|email=wilkension@myemail.org
|homepage=www.website.org/wilkension
|birthday=1970-12-03
|categories=Project Manager, Seiltanzen
|note=IPMA certified PM
}}
|own_work=True |copyright_holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[part of bundle::Richmedia| ]] {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); margin: 0pt 0pt 0.5em 1em; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; position: relative; border-collapse: collapse; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; float: right; clear: right; width: 30%;" |- ! style="background: rgb(174, 213, 219) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; color: black;" colspan="2" | Image:vcard.gif poly 0 0 0 0 [[Display]] desc none vCard Data |- {{#if:{{{name|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Name: |Value={{{name|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{title|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Title: |Value={{{title|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{organization|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Organization: |Value={{{organization|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{nickName|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Nickname: |Value={{{nickName|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{phone|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Phone: |Value={{{phone|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{address|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Address: |Value={{{address|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{email|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Email: |Value={{{email|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{homepage|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Homepage: |Value={{{homepage|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{birthday|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Birthday: |Value={{{birthday|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{categories|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Categories: |Value={{{categories|}}}}}|}} |- {{#if:{{{note|}}}|{{Tablerow||Label=Note: |Value={{{note|}}}}}|}} |- |} {{#ifexist:{{#extractEmailID: {{{email}}} | Mbox }} | [[HasRelatedArticle::{{#extractEmailID: {{{email}}} | Mbox }}| ]] | [[HasRelatedArticle::{{{name|}}}| ]] }}
